name: Network Systems Architects
overview:
First and foremost, NSAi is an IT services company.

NSAi services are focused towards solving critical business problems for our clients. NSAi’s PMI (Project Management Institute) certified Project Managers drive every project to create maximum Return On Investment (ROI) for our clients.

NSAi accomplishes these goals utilizing industry standard ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) methodologies.

In combination with the ITIL and PMI standards, our certified engineers utilize and refine best practices in each of our areas of core competency to create maximum results for our client organizations.

The NSAi team acts as a force multiplier for our clients by directly engaging against client problems while concurrently designing and implementing best practices to enable our client’s IT staff operate at maximum effectiveness.
